TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler(object sender, ObjectDataSourceEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ObjectDataSourceEventArgs)
public delegate void ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ObjectDataSourceEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将用于处理 控件的 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件检索和显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 在此示例中，如下所示许多实际方案中，它可能不可能或不适合使用的业务对象的默认实例控件。In this example, as in many real-world scenarios, it might not be possible or appropriate to use a default instance of the business object with the control. 在此示例中，无法成功调用默认构造函数，因为它将引发异常。In this example, the cannot successfully call the default constructor because it will throw an exception. 在某些情况下，默认构造函数可能会受到保护，并在其他它可能不会初始化为所需状态的业务对象。In some cases, the default constructor might be protected, and in others it might not initialize the business object to a desired state. 无论什么原因，你可以实例化业务对象自己，并将实例设置为属性对象传递给处理程序。Whatever the reason, you can instantiate the business object yourself and set the instance to the property of the object that is passed to the handler. 这是业务对象实例将用于执行其工作。This is the business object instance that the will use to perform its work. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/objds15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/objds15vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示在前面的示例中使用的示例基本业务对象。The following code example demonstrates the example basic business object used in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/northwindemployee15.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/northwindemployee15.vb#2)]
